did.head: Collection Overview
did.unittitle: Rose Villano and Carolina Golzio oral histories
did.abstract: Oral history interviews with two Italian American women, Rose Villano and Carolina (Carrie) Golzio involved in the Paterson, N.J., Silk Workers' Strike, 1913.

scopecontent.p: Oral history interviews with two Italian American women, Rose Villano and Carolina (Carrie) Golzio involved in the Paterson, N.J., Silk Workers' Strike, 1913. Interviews conducted by Steve Golin, June 13, 1983-Sept 25, 1985. Collection contains audio recordings and transcripts.

accessrestrict.p: The papers are open to research according to the regulations of the Sophia Smith Collection.

userestrict.p: Copyright to unpublished materials may be owned by the creator, or their heirs or assigns. It is the responsibility of the researcher to identify and satisfy the holders of all copyrights. Permission to publish reproductions or quotations beyond "fair use" must also be obtained from the Sophia Smith Collection as owners of the physical property.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Rose Villano oral history and Carolina Golzio oral history, Sophia Smith Collection, Smith College, Northampton, Mass.

altformavail.head: Additional Formats
altformavail.p: Research copies of audio recordings are available as digital files.
